channel.title: Problems with 562
channel.description:
Okay heres my problem:
I have ElementX 562 source & client, it worked fine on local host but when I tried to put it on my VPS and run the client it says that no internal or external java could be found or used or something I forget. When I try to connect to the client it has a [b]Error_game_Js5connect[/b] (Which I hear is an error between the source and client connecting to each other). I have changed my IP in the client and this is the first time I have tried to put a server online. Am I missing other places to put the VPS ip?

item.title: Problems with 562
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Install java on your vps and put in your CLASSPATH and PATH variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with 562
item.dc:creator: @coryallen1 coryallen1
item.description:
@coryallen1 wrote:

Heres what I get when I try to run my server:

I would host on my computer but sometimes we get alot of players online and my comp would probably shit blood and die.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with 562
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

The only .java files you should need too change your ip would be client.java

Make sure that the VPS has java I guess xP, and that you didn’t mistype the ip… I’m not really good with VPS as me and our friends host em, but I’m just trying too point you into a direction.

Read full topic
